org.qbroker.node

Class NodeUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.qbroker.node.NodeUtils

  • public class NodeUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    NodeUtils contains a bunch of constants and static methods on brokers for common uses
    Author:
    yannanlu@yahoo.com

    • Method Detail

      • initFixedOutLinks

        public static AssetList initFixedOutLinks(long tm,
                          int outCapacity,
                          int size,
                          int[] overlap,
                          java.lang.String name,
                          java.util.List list)
        It initializes all fixed outLinks stored in list and returns an instance of AssetList with metaData on each of outLinks. The array of overlap determines what outLinks are allowed to be overlapped with others before it. It also initializes non-overlapping outLinks after the last allowed overlap outLinks. For those, it will skip any duplicated outLinks.

      • initOutLinks

        public static AssetList initOutLinks(long tm,
                     int outCapacity,
                     int size,
                     int overflow,
                     java.lang.String name,
                     java.util.List list)
        It initializes all outLinks stored in list and returns an instance of AssetList with metaData on each of outLinks. Any duplicated or malformed outLinks will be ignored. If overflow is positive, OverflowOption will be stored in outInfo at position of overflow.

      • passthru

        public static int passthru(long waitTime,
           javax.jms.Message msg,
           XQueue in,
           XQueue out,
           long[] outInfo,
           int option)
        puts a msg to out XQ with overflowOption implemented and returns a non-negative number upon success or -1 otherwise

        public static void stopRunning(XQueue xq)
